rules: Rule1: If the plant analysis produces data, then the facility is operational.
Rule2: Whenever data processing uses an AI algorithm, the AI algorithm requires a GPU cluster.
Rule3: The use of an AI algorithm in data processing implies that data analysis uses a machine learning model.
Rule4: Either data processing uses an AI algorithm or data processing uses manual methods.
Rule5: In the event that data processing uses manual methods, the plant analysis produces data.
Rule6: Should the AI algorithm require a GPU cluster, the plant analysis produces data.
Rule7: If the facility has backup power, then the facility is operational.
Rule8: The facility has backup power or the facility has generator power.
Rule9: If there is a system failure in the power grid, then the power grid is operational.
Rule10: A system failure in the power grid implies that the power grid is not operational.
Rule11: Provided that the facility uses solar energy, the facility is operational.
Rule12: Either the facility uses solar energy or the facility uses wind energy.
Rule13: The facility having redundant servers leads to the data servers being online.
Rule14: If the facility has cloud backup, then there is no power outage at the facility.
Rule15: Data security of the storage system implies that there is no data corruption in the storage system.
Rule16: An environmental violation by the facility means that the facility is not in environmental compliance.
Rule17: If the study is peer-reviewed, then either the research team publishes findings or the research facility conducts research on crop optimization.
Rule18: Provided that the research facility conducts research on crop optimization, if it has approval from the regulatory board, then it has government funding.
Rule19: In the case that the study is a preliminary report, either the research team publishes findings or the research facility conducts research on crop optimization.
Rule20: Valid research of the study necessitates that the study has replicable results.
Rule21: If the study has replicable results, then it is either peer-reviewed or a preliminary report.
Rule22: Safety protocols in the bio lab lead to proper containment in the bio lab.
Rule23: Whenever data analysis uses a machine learning model, the machine learning model is a neural network.
Rule24: If the machine learning model is a neural network, then the neural network has a deep learning architecture.
Rule25: A deep learning architecture in the neural network ensures that the plant analysis produces data.
Rule26: If the research facility violates environmental laws, then the facility is in environmental compliance.
Rule27: Violation of environmental laws by the research facility implies that the facility commits an environmental violation.
Rule28: Should the research facility violate environmental laws, then the research facility operates legally.
Rule29: The research facility violating environmental laws means that the research facility does not operate legally.
Rule30: Either the research facility violates environmental laws or the research facility conducts research on crop optimization.

Rule31: Either the equipment undergoes a routine check or, if it is not the case that either the equipment undergoes scheduled maintenance or (if the facility has generator power, then the facility is operational), then the equipment requires emergency repair.
Rule32: A network failure in the data center implies that there is no server downtime in the data center.

Rule33: If the system uses automated backup, then, provided that it is not the case that either the facility has redundant servers or the facility has cloud backup, there is no data loss in the storage system.
Rule34: Either the system uses automated backup or the system uses manual backup.
Rule35: Should the system use manual backup, then, if it is not the case that either the facility has redundant servers or the facility has cloud backup, there is no data loss in the storage system.
Rule36: If the drone vehicle monitors plant health, then the soil samples do not have contamination.
Rule37: The sensor technology requiring calibration implies that, if the drone vehicle uses advanced sensors, then the drone vehicle monitors plant health.
Rule38: If it is not the case that if the facility has generator power, then the facility is operational, then there is a system failure in the power grid.
Rule39: Should it not be true that if the facility uses wind energy, then the facility is operational, then there is a power outage at the facility.
Rule40: If it is not the case that either the facility has redundant servers or the facility has cloud backup, then the storage system experiences data corruption.
Rule41: Provided that it is not the case that either the facility has redundant servers or the facility has cloud backup, the data center experiences server downtime.
Rule42: In the event that it is not the case that either the facility has redundant servers or the facility has cloud backup, the data center experiences network failure.
Rule43: If it is not the case that either the facility has redundant servers or the facility has cloud backup, then the storage system experiences data loss.
Rule44: In the event that it is not true that if the facility is not operational, then the soil samples do not have contamination, the bio lab follows safety protocols.
Rule45: Should it not be the case that if the facility is not operational, then the soil samples do not have contamination, then the bio lab does not have proper containment.
Rule46: The facility not being operational implies that the research facility has approval from the regulatory board.
Rule47: Provided that the facility is not operational, the soil samples have contamination.
Rule48: Whenever the facility is not operational, the drone vehicle uses advanced sensors.
Rule49: If the facility is not operational, then the research facility does not have government funding.
facts: Fact1: The storage system is data secure.
Fact2: The study is valid research.
Fact3: The sensor technology requires calibration.
Fact4: It is not the case that the data servers are online.
Fact5: The research team does not publish findings.
Fact6: The equipment does not undergo scheduled maintenance.
Fact7: The equipment does not require emergency repair.
Fact8: The equipment does not undergo a routine check.
